name: Decoction Tower
text:
{T}: Add {C}
{T}, Take a shot: Add {B}{B}
flavor: No batch is perfect, sometimes you have to boil part of the mash again to get the desired effect.

notes.creator: Sam
notes.notes: also, changed the new from brewing spire to Decoction tower, as i thought brewing spire was a really lame name lol. Decoction is the process of taking half of the mash and boiling it again before adding it back to the batch. It felt kind of like beer making eugenics which aligns with Yawgmoth and the phyrexians
